resources.string: "%1$s needs permission to access your camera to create a 3D map of your surroundings."
"%1$s needs permission to access your camera for this site."
"%1$s needs permission to access your microphone for this site."
"%1$s needs permission to access your camera and microphone for this site."
"%1$s needs access to your location to share your location with this site."
"Continue"
"To continue, turn on NFC in Android settings"
"Turn on"
"This site can’t ask for your permission"
"Close any bubbles or overlays from other apps. Then try again."
"<link>Get help</link>"
"Pair"
"Connected device"
"%1$s wants to pair"
"No compatible devices found"
"<link>Get help</link> while scanning for devices…"
"<link1>Get help</link1> or <link2>re-scan</link2>"
"Chrome needs location access to scan for devices. Location access is <services_link>turned off for this device</services_link>."
"Chrome needs location access to scan for devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>. Location access is also <services_link>turned off for this device</services_link>."
"Chrome needs permission to scan for nearby devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>."
"Chrome needs location access to scan for devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>"
"<link>Get help</link>"
"Chrome is unable to turn on Bluetooth adaptor"
"<link>Turn on Bluetooth</link> to allow pairing"
"%1$s wants to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices. The following devices have been found:"
"Unknown or unsupported device (%1$s)"
